attributes.action: Stop the British people paying the BBC licence fee
attributes.additional_details:
When I was growing up the BBC was something to be admired and it was the standard used around the world, something to be proud of.
Now, reduced to the London centric politically correct machine promoting everything and anything anti British, ashamed of our and it's past.
Funny how we try and get one hundred thousand signatures so the other half of the problem in London can discuss.
attributes.background: Not saying the BBC shouldn't exist but as I don't share their values I shouldn't be expected to fund this now left wing politically correct think tank.
